channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @amyklobuchar i think it's more like it's an alternate reality, like living in a science fiction movie, like man in the high castle, where germany and japan won ww ii. and it isn't just women who feel that. let's make this as big as it is, not make it smaller.

My blogging ethos came from the Whole Earth Catalog. They moved from technical howto-type stuff to whatever was on @stewartbrand's mind. If the ideas come from the same mind, and the pub is a product of that person's mind, it's perfect.
I remember reading it at my uncle's house in florida, totally off the grid little geodesic he made himself. i loved the Whole Earth book because it seemed like my uncle. an engineer and hippie. he was another big influence in my eclectic, jumping where my mind wanted to go.

I wonder if Pelosi were president now we might have a better chance to turn this whole thing around. I dream of a court that's 4-3-2 (conservative, liberal, moderate) to make sense out of the mess the new court is making. We could make a lot of lemonade here imho.

@nakedjen actually yes. i've come to realize that too. for all of JL's disdain for commercialism, he thought of himself as a Dylan, he was a master at commercialism.
@nakedjen and JL was definitely the alpha. watching Get Back you could see that in their relationship.
@nakedjen there was not a dry eye in the house. ;-)

Kyrie Irving and the Nets sounds like a bad Silicon Valley novel. https://t.co/vdxexCRueh
BTW, the best Silicon Valley novel ever imho was Microserfs. After you read the book, it programs you to think you're *in* the book. Amazing how complete the virtuality was.
https://t.co/gtP7qbu6v9
For print newspapers, one Florida retirement community is a better market than Atlanta, St. Louis, or Portland. https://t.co/XeS5sRNwvW

Paul McCartney sings I've Got a Feeling at Glastonbury. Near the end they bring up John Lennon on the screen singing his part of the duo while McC sings his. Very emotional moment. Thanks to John Naughton for the link. https://t.co/xZ9wEPfDOb
This picture could be entitled Patriarchy. That's some church dude. Looks more like KGB. https://t.co/uqbiYXtdRH

Biden is keeping the seat warm for DeSantis. Unless he steps aside after the November election and lets the next gen of Dems duke it out.

@TommyBeer There are no Nets fans, so give it up.

The Democrats had plenty of time to prepare, and they did nothing. How the hell could they be so incompetent.
